#labels examples
#Charting examples

== Simple chart ==
The code below produces:
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?chd=t%3A5%2C4%2C6&cht=p3&chs=300x150&chtt=Servings&chf=bg%2Cs%2CFFFFFF.png

{{{
  $chart = array(
      '#chart_id' => 'test_chart',
      '#title' => t('Servings'),
      '#type' => CHART_TYPE_PIE_3D,
      '#encoding' => CHART_ENCODING_TEXT,
    );
    
  $chart['#data']['fruits'] = 3;
  $chart['#data']['meats']  = 2;
  $chart['#data']['dairy']  = 5;

  $output .= chart_render($chart);
}}}
